text: Terebra neglecta is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Terebra neglecta (Poppe, Tagaro & Terryn, 2009). title: Terebra neglecta
